remarks: If two sets are equinumerous, then they have equal cardinalities.  (This assertion and ~ carden2a are meant to replace ~ carden in ZF without AC.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jan-2013.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-Apr-2015.)
statement: carden2b $p |- ( A ~~ B -> ( card ` A ) = ( card ` B ) ) $.
